summary: LandingScreen was updated to remove any localized price display and instead render a static hero image loaded from /assets/generated/landing-hero.dim_1200x600.png. However, the diff shows no new static asset being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the required image file itself is not evidenced as present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the removed Landing price area with a new visually appealing static image on the Landing screen, stored and served as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated (landing-hero.dim_1200x600.png).
missing_requirements.reason: LandingScreen references the new image path, but the diff indicates no added files; there is no evidence the required image asset was actually added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: File diff summary: ADDED FILES: none
